secondaries.shortDescription: End of turn, if 2 Acts of faith were performed by ADEPTAS SORTITAS units, score 1 VP if it's your turn, 2 if it's opponents. With 3 acts, score 1 more.

subObjectives.description: You made 2 acts of faith during your turn
You made 2 acts of faith during your ENEMY turn
You made 3 acts of faith during any turn

secondaries.shortDescription: End of Shooting phase score 1 for each enemy unit was destroyed with a bolt weapon OR a flame weapon OR a melta weapon by a ADEPTUS MINISTORUM.

subObjectives.description: You destroyed an ENEMY unit with an attach by an ADEPTUS MINITORUM using a bolt weapon (5VP max)
You destroyed an ENEMY unit with an attach by an ADEPTUS MINITORUM using a flame weapon(5VP max)
You destroyed an ENEMY unit with an attach by an ADEPTUS MINITORUM using a melta weapon(5VP max)

secondaries.shortDescription: ADEPTA SORITAS INFANTRY and CULT IMPERIALIS PRIEST can attempt a Sacred Grounds action. Until end of battle, that objective gains INSPIRING terrain trait. Score 1 if the objective was wholly within your deployment zone, otherwise score 5

subObjectives.description: ONCE PER OBJECTIVE Consecrate ground action has been completed wholly inside of your deployment zone objective
ONCE PER OBJECTIVE Consecrate ground action has been completed outside of your deployment zone objective

secondaries.shortDescription: During the Resolve Pre-Battle Abilities, choose a marker in your deployment as the Shrine. Score 3 if you controle the Shrine AND an ADEPTUS MINISTORUM is within range of it. At the end of the battle, if your opponent control it you get -3
secondaries.scoringPhase: End of Turn, End of Game

subObjectives.description: You Control the Sacred Shrine at the end of your turn and have an ADEPTUS MINISTORUM in range
Your enemy Control the Sacred Shrine at the end of the game
